name: beehivegameshow
description: This is an experiment in getting AI to create a gameshow style frontend, backend, and DB that can register players and organise them into assigned or random teams

scripts.generate-types: source .env && export SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN && export SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID && npx supabase gen types typescript --project-id $SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID --schema public > src/lib/db/database.types.ts
